alert.note: Alert for Cass; Morgan; Schuyler (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 31 at 4:56PM CDT until further notice by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM CDT FOR WESTERN CASS...SOUTH CENTRAL SCHUYLER AND NORTHWESTERN MORGAN COUNTIES... At 455 PM CDT, a confirmed tornado was located near Meredosia, or 14 miles southwest of Beardstown, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Damaging tornado and baseball size hail. SOURCE...Emergency management confirmed tornado. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This tornado will be near... Meredosia around 500 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this tornadic thunderstorm include Beardstown, Bluff Springs and Arenzville. TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.75 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a tornado is on the ground. TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
